column4: Hi, I've installed a LAMP server but I need to customize my PHP configuration. I need to add several things, such as mcrypt and PDFLib. Are there packages to do this?
LAMP from Ubuntu Server? you probably need to edit /etc/php.conf (or something like that)
No, I need extra modules that don't come with the install.
UTF-8 can be up to 32 bits per character, iirc
